name: Augustine Yap
text: No chance in hell. Game of Thrones has no Hobbits. No innocents bearing a great burden. I foresee only a bittersweet ending, a "good enough, all things considered."

source_obj.text: No chance in hell. Game of Thrones has no Hobbits. No innocents bearing a great burden. I foresee only a bittersweet ending, a "good enough, all things considered."

replies.text: Ok lang bittersweet, basta satisfying and not something stupid lol. Problema sa mga long epic fantasy series, they're really hard to end well
Well, it's not coming out until 2019 so hopefully that's enough time for writing a semi proper ending. I don't need epic at this point. I'll settle for not rushed.
